this is no longer screening 8) Practice audit definitions: a negative screen is defined as categories 1 and 2; a positive screen is defined as categories 3 and 4 9) Category 4B Management: this is predicated on the prob ability of malignancy based on patient evaluation, patient preference and risk of malignancy;
